entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 09:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then northeast 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
